document.full_text: thomson reuters corp named pulitzer-prize winning journalist and former dow jones newswires president paul ingrassia to the new position of deputy editor-in-chief, one of four new hires brought in to overhaul its news operations.
document.title: thomson reuters overhauls news management team
lines_and_colors: thomson reuters corp named pulitzer-prize winning journalist and former dow jones newswires president paul ingrassia to the new position of deputy editor-in-chief, one of four new hires brought in to overhaul its news operations.
